title: Neeko damage
body: Just going to say. For the insane amount of utility she provides her damage better be non-existant.

replies.body:
If you have a difference of opinion please     let me hear it.  I have stated my position and will elaborate on the information available to us thusfar.  
I cant help but  feel Riot just introduced another problematic champion

> [{quoted}](name=Mordepool,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JQ9rAnZi,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-11-19T18:47:41.665+0000)
>
> If you have a difference of opinion please     let me hear it.  I have stated my position and will elaborate on the information available to us thusfar.  
> I cant help but  feel Riot just introduced another problematic champion

What 'utiility'? 

Shes trickster lux with out a shield while having  jungle support and a skill floor.

She has a shield on her Ult !!!???  Did you not look at her abilities.

As for utility that chameleon ability is nuts

> [{quoted}](name=Mordepool,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JQ9rAnZi,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-19T19:17:47.339+0000)
>
> She has a shield on her Ult !!!???  Did you not look at her abilities.
> 
> As for utility that chameleon ability is nuts

A small shield that seems to follow a trend riot wants for these kinds of abilities. I wouldnt be surprised if fiddlesticks and amumu got one too.

her W isnt offensive or team-powerful utility, its personal utility that doesnt even last very long. At best its a juke tool for outplays. 
She isnt mobile for the most part, her damage is loaded in her Q and synergizes with her E, she doesnt synergize outwardly (others synergize with her) i think, her ultimate is basically a zyra ultimate with her at the center. 

Really, youre over reacting. Take off the sunglasses and try to look at the world with a little less rancor.

Your accusation of Rancor is unfounded. 
Im just highlighting  what i see as problematic  in this new champ design. Thats all
shes has to be able to defend herself. just looking like someone else isnt op. she has to have dmg orshe will just get invaded al the time and then what is she going to do? just root and run away?
Perhaps my comment on non-existant damage was an exaggeration on my part. Sure   but this kit  will be oppressive  if its damage is too high  100%.
yeah il agree with you dare but it wont be as oppresive as leblanc because shes basicly a leblanc but more tricky. and doesnt have 200 dashes

> [{quoted}](name=Witchy Wench,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JQ9rAnZi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-19T18:39:17.994+0000)
>
> <Removed by Moderation>

yeah who cares about game balance and having fun
probably gonna be one shotting everyone with her ult tbh

Honestly the delay on it doesnt look like much when  she's going to Out pacing alot of champs with her Movement speed bonuses. Not to mention   being unaware of a Massive AOE stun when she appears as someone else. 

Like i guess Riot just Threw out the  Book on Counterplay.
She doesn't have any dashes and all her skill shots look pretty easy to dodge
not really? her dmg is alright but her ult 100% needs a 1 sec stun at most at all ranks along with a 150 cd
I would says so but then there's Zoe with half kit one-shot half kit utility and it was considered okay enough to be released, so I expect her to be broken.
I want her to have enough damage to jg.
